body_html: Bump- any interest? I've tried to justify an outer product tf.outer analogous to np.outer as a useful basic tensor operation that will find application in loss functions, but someone else will have to comment on if the implementation effort is worthwhile.
body_text: Bump- any interest?  I've tried to justify an outer product tf.outer analogous to np.outer as a useful basic tensor operation that will find application in loss functions, but someone else will have to comment on if the implementation effort is worthwhile.
body: Bump- any interest?  I've tried to justify an outer product `tf.outer` analogous to `np.outer` as a useful basic tensor operation that will find application in loss functions, but someone else will have to comment on if the implementation effort is worthwhile.
